data.oai_dc:dc: This file contains the R script used to analyze relatedness between different categories of individuals within and between logs using permuted Wilcoxon Rank Sum test following the methods of Wolf & Trillmich (2008). Use data from “Relatedness_Odisjunctus.xls” to create .csv files to run with this code to replicate results.
Population genetics|Ecological genetics|cooperative breeding|delayed dispersal|family living|parental care
